description: This file defines the JwtService class responsible for generating and parsing JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) using the io.jsonwebtoken library. It provides methods for token creation, validation, and claims extraction, utilizing application-specific properties for configuration.

classes.name: JwtService
classes.description: Service class for handling JWT creation and validation, utilizing HS256 signing algorithm and application-specific properties.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT with subject, claims, and expiration based on configuration.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Parses and validates a JWT token, returning claims if valid, throws exception if invalid.

methods.name: tryParseClaims
methods.description: Attempts to parse claims from a token, returning null if invalid or expired.
